QuestData.Title: Sign of the Dusk Lily
QuestData.Description: Simply... astounding.$b$bI have not felt this clear of mind in so long.$b$bI am still weak... I need to rest. But first...$b$b<Vanthir gestures to the top of his cage with a trembling hand.>$b$bShow them that the Dusk Lily triumphs this day.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place a Dusk Lily Sigil above Vanthir's Cage.
QuestData.RewardText: I will see that he is made comfortable next chance I get. We made a great stride forward today, $n.$b$bElisande will not soon forget that we do not simply abandon our own.
